data.name: Security Guy vs AI: The Dawn of AI
data.detailed_description: The very first day at work is always a challenge. But nobody said that the challenge may be deadly! Security Guy vs AI is a short top-down shooter game with a mysterious story. You are a security officer who ended up in the wrong place at the wrong time. Travel through the dark Robot Factory controlled by the Evil Artificial Intelligence, use you fight skills to survive and find out what happened. During the course of the adventure, you will find advanced weapons, discover secret technologies and face lethal enemies.
data.about_the_game: The very first day at work is always a challenge. But nobody said that the challenge may be deadly! Security Guy vs AI is a short top-down shooter game with a mysterious story. You are a security officer who ended up in the wrong place at the wrong time. Travel through the dark Robot Factory controlled by the Evil Artificial Intelligence, use you fight skills to survive and find out what happened. During the course of the adventure, you will find advanced weapons, discover secret technologies and face lethal enemies.
data.short_description: Security guy vs AI is a short top-down shooter game with a mysterious story. Reveal the truth about what happened at your workplace and stop the Evil Artificial Intelligence from spreading out.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Core i3-9100F
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce MX250
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
